title: Energy Healing | Carillon Miami Wellness Resort
description: Balance the mind and body with a special energy healing session with Ricardo Kmentt at Carillon Miami. Align your chakras and schedule a session today.
cleaned_text: Energy Healing Energy Healing Stimulate energy flow in the human body to restore balance and enable the physical body to heal itself There are many factors that can degrade our bio-energetic field including toxic and processed food, emotional trauma, negative patterns or thoughts and early childhood wounds. Energy Healing facilitates a harmonizing process by clearing blocks of stagnated energy in the body, repairing and re-balancing the energy patterns. Healing may not be so much about getting better, as about letting go of everything that isn't you - all of the expectations, all of the beliefs - and becoming who you are. Energy Healing may facilitate: - Faster recovery from surgery and trauma - Relief of pain and symptoms associated with many diseases - Deep states of relaxation - Decreased levels of stress, anxiety and depression - Increased creative expression - Enhanced self-esteem and sense of personal power in the now - A heightened sense of well-being and joy - Spiritual and personal development - Appreciation for the diversity and wonder of life ENERGY HEALING PRACTITIONER Ricardo Kmentt Ricardo Kmentt is a master in his art of healing with over 10 years of experience and training as a professional healer. He was formally trained at the Barbara Brennan School of Healing, the world's premier institute of Hands-On-Healing and Personal Transformation. This is not a Reiki session but a hands-on and a healing touch session. He has studied under Byron Katie and uses her method of teaching in his sessions. To learn more about her technique [click here.](https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fthework.com%2f&c=E,1,TALmvFY5kXL7QlMvjf2D32kNqzXsGdgGDRi-p2V6uBH6rBHrC-FjieB2Vh9PrJbyd4vbH_8oHhgNn5NRBsMGYpviN8EW-OZS6axgSibh&typo=1) He holds a diverse background as an Acupuncturist Physician with various qualifications including a master's degree in Oriental Medicine and a bachelor's degree in Science Health, providing him with a strong understanding of the body and the many ways of holistic healing. "Healing may not be so much about getting better, as about letting go of everything that isn't you - all of the expectations, all of the beliefs - and becoming who you are" Services and treatments described above may be provided by an independent third-party consultant.
